'''Clear Dvalin Tear''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after completing the {{Quest|That Green Fellow}}. It is used to [[Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel|partially repair]] the [[Holy Lyre der Himmel]] during the Archon Quest ''[[State of the Holy Lyre der Himmel]]''.
